Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute near Kinzie/Dearborn
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses temp. rerouted SB Dearborn, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and Dearborn; NB State, Wacker, Clark, Hubbard and Dearborn: near Kinzie/Dearborn..

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Kinzie/Dearborn, due to street blockage near Kinzie/Dearborn.

Southbound buses will operate via Dearborn, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and Dearborn including the normal route streets.

Northbound buses will operate via State, Wacker, Clark, Hubbard and Dearborn.

Allow extra travel time.

ShortDescription: 29 State , 36 Broadway  buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and State: due to, street blockage near Kinzie/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State , #36 Broadway  buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and State: due to, street blockage near Kinzie/Dearborn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Berteau
ShortDescription: #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Montrose, Cicero, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Berteau.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Montrose, Cicero then resume their normal route on Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Berteau.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Reroute at Belmont/Menard
ShortDescription: 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Central, Addison, Austin and Belmont, due to police activity near Belmont/Menard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Central, Addison, Austin, then resume their normal route on Belmont, due to police activity near Belmont/Menard.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute near Central/Lake
ShortDescription: #85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to police activity near Central/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to police activity near Central/Lake.

Southbound buses will operate via Central, Chicago, Laramie, Lake, then resume their normal route on Central.

Northbound buses will operate via Central, Corcoran, Laramie, Chicago,  Lake, then resume their normal route on Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running with wait times of up to 30 minutes; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 30 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.
